#labels Featured
= Supported OS =
Developed under Fedora
But in theory everywhere you have htmlcxx and boost - you have whalebot 

= Dependecies =
 * [http://htmlcxx.sourceforge.net/ htmlcxx v 0.84]
 * [http://www.boost.org/ boost] currently used asio, program options, filesystem, algorithm string, unordered map, thread, date_time and other
 * custom libs in svn

= Build system =
Currently rely on [http://netbeans.org/ netbeans-cpp] and there is project files for him. May be need some hand-crafting for build and placing binaries

= Start-crawl =

{{{
webspider -s http://google.com -O ~/web
}}}

 # Wait for some time
 # Wait again
 # ...
 # *THE WHOLE INTERNET* on your hard drive :)

For more accurate parametrs tuning see CommandLineParameters
